content:
The animal shelter wants to build its new location halfway between the towns of Springfield and Greenville.  Springfield is located at $(10,3)$ on the map below.  Greenville is located at $(10,11)$. 

**Plot Springfield, Greenville, and the new shelter on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**At what coordinates should the animal shelter build its new location?**    
$($[[☃ input-number 1]]$,\,$[[☃ input-number 2]]$)$
